text:
-ELECT
Station WHA-TV, Madison, Wis.
December 26, 1958
Mr. James S. Miles
Station WBAA
Purdue University
Lafayette, Indiana
Dear Jim:
I have already done this on the telephone but just to
make it official let me take this opportunity to again extend
my congratulations cm your election as Director of Region III
and to welcome you back to the NAEB Board of Directors.
I'm well aware that there are a lot of tough problems
ahead for my administration and it gives me a good deal of
confidence to realize that I have "old hands" whom I admire
and respect to help share the responsibilities.
I look forward to seeing you in person in Chicago on the
6th and meanwhile, my very best wishes for the holiday season.
Cordially yours.
WGH: jc
William G. Harley
